document_data.name: Farida bint Thuriya
document_data.mainbody: '''Farida bint Thuriya''' was a [[moralist]] and an ambassador of the [[Pantheist League]].
document_data.Personality: Farida was known to be a very passionate and holy crusader for the Pantheist League.
document_data.History: In [[1367 DR]]{{AQ-time}}, Farida was a member of the royal court of [[Rog'osto]]'s khedive, [[Samia al-Sa'id]], acting as a representative of the Pantheist League. During this time she was known to pay [[adventurer]]s for whatever treasures they found out in the uncharted wilderness of the [[Cities of the Ancients|Ruined Kingdoms]], after which she would arrange to have them smuggled out of Rog'osto.
document_data.Relationships: Farida was distrustful of Rog'osto's laymen [[mage]]s and weak [[priest]]s, believing that they inherent power within the city should not rest in their hands.
